mpristoast.option.replace.tooltip: If turned on, there will be no music toasts with vanilla music even if no other music is playing on your system
mpristoast.option.preferred.tooltip: Set a music source that will be used when it's active. `None` will always use the one that is discovered first
mpristoast.option.only_preferred.tooltip: If turned on, nothing will be used if the preferred source is not active. Set `Preferred source` to anything but `None`, otherwise there will never be music shown
